name: Yomi
dialog: Welcome, guest! Welcome to Yomi's clothing store.

name: Yomi
dialog: Oh? Long time no see.

name: Yomi
dialog: Do you want to be a fashionista? Try on Yomi's clothes! Hehehe.

name: 주인공
dialog: I was invited to a friend's house. So I came to buy new clothes.

name: 주인공
dialog: Wow, there are a lot of clothes, hats, bags, and accessories.

name: 주인공
dialog: There are so many that I don't know which one to choose.

name: Yomi
dialog: I'll choose the perfect outfit for you, guest.

name: Yomi
dialog: I've been interested in clothes since I was a kid.

name: Yomi
dialog: So I've made doll clothes and watched a lot of fashion show videos.

name: Yomi
dialog: That's how I developed my fashion sense.

name: Yomi
dialog: My dream was to become a fashion designer, and I finally achieved it, hehehe.

name: Yomi
dialog: What do you think P_name will be doing on July 7th at 7 PM when he/she turns 25?

name: 주인공
dialog: Hmm... Let me see...

name: 주인공
dialog: Hmm... Let me see...

name: Yomi
dialog: Wow

name: Yomi
dialog: That's a great imagination!

name: Yomi
dialog: So, what kind of dream should you have in order for that imagination to become a reality?

name: Yomi
dialog: Do you want to express it in a drawing?

name: 주인공
dialog: Um... I want to achieve this dream.

name: Yomi
dialog: Yes, you will definitely achieve your dream.

name: Yomi
dialog: What can P_name do to achieve that dream?

name: Yomi
dialog: Make a plan on what you can do.

name: Yomi
dialog: Make a plan on what you can do.

name: Yomi
dialog: Oh, that's a great plan!

name: Yomi
dialog: If you follow your plan, you will get closer to your dream, hehehe.

name: Yomi
dialog: Here's a gift of encouragement from Yomi.

name: Yomi
dialog: I support P_name's dream. Stay strong!

name: 주인공
dialog: Stay strong!

name: end
dialog: end
